ygData.subject: RE: Bard armour
ygData.msgSnippet: My armor and weapons total, with 3 weapons, is 53 lbs.  I wear Crush s tunic, very light AC12 and +8 to Magic/Fire/Cold.  I also wear a lizardscale mantle,
ygData.messageBody:
My armor and weapons total, with 3 weapons, is 53 lbs. I wear Crush's
tunic, very light AC12 and +8 to Magic/Fire/Cold. I also wear a lizardscale
mantle, used to wear a mesh mantle though, smae ac as leather, but far
lighter. I wear barbed sleves now, but they are kinda heavy so I may trade
them in an go back to mesh sleeves. I wear mesh pants, a leatherfoot raider
cap, same ac as leather. I haven't had any difficulties staying in fights
so far, despite my light armor. I have found that while I often take big
hits, I get hit less often due to more frequent dodges. It seems to work
out fairly close to the same as when I tried going all banded and its far
lighter. In all banded I was close to max weight with no loot and only two
weapons.

Kitasi

From: "Arwen" <arwen@...>


>So anyway, are there any suggestions about the type of armour I can
>get that will be lighter? Looking for cheap alternatives, or
>somewhere to go murder things and steal their armour. I can even go
>out and deal with (most) wisps as a steady source of income if cheap
>isn't possible ;-)
>Melaniel
>Wood Elf Bard (11), Mith Marr server



I would suggest a bloodstained tunic, lizzie scale mantle and cloack, and
blackend armor for the rest. Looks great and if weight is an issue it will
help alot. Yes the armor is NICE to have..I persoanlly wear a combo of
charred plate and bronze right now, but i have so many strength enhancers it
isnt even funny! As a young bard the above items will be abit above your
level for now..but well within the grasp of a rich bard..so get your mage to
support you (LOL). Good luck to you Melaniel. May your songs be well
recieved!

Elyana Silvanae
